title: Why has the claimed dark matter discovery sparked debate, caution?
description: Physicists don’t know what dark matter is made up of, but one hypothesis is it’s made of a new type of subatomic particle called WIMPs. According to physicists, WIMPs barely interact with normal matter and not at all with light. The trick to finding them then is the high-energy particles released when two WIMPs annihilate each other

title: IPL Auction: 'They missed a trick' - R Ashwin questions CSK’s strategy

He suggests Kolkata Knight Riders could have employed a more patient bidding strategy to force CSK's hand earlier. Ashwin lauded Green as a generational talent, calling his acquisition by KKR brilliant.

title: ‘This is how we did it’: China embassy has advice for Delhi pollution- what it said
description: China's Beijing has significantly improved its air quality by implementing stringent vehicle emission controls, phasing out old vehicles, and promoting electric mobility. The nation also undertook industrial restructuring, relocating heavy industries and transforming former factory sites. These comprehensive, large-scale, and urgent measures offer valuable lessons for India's approach to tackling air pollution.

His wife, Celeste Desjardins, celebrated with a heartfelt message, calling him 'AMAZING' and 'incredibly proud'.

title: Delhi pollution: Air quality stays in very poor zone; likely to turn severe by end of December
description: Delhi's air quality remains poor, with a slight improvement to 334 on the AQI due to strong winds. However, pollution is expected to persist, potentially worsening to severe levels by month's end. Emissions from Haryana and local vehicles are significant contributors. Shallow fog is trapping pollutants, impacting flights and visibility.

title: Wang Kun cause of death: Chinese bodybuilding champion dies suddenly at 30
description: Chinese bodybuilding champion Wang Kun, aged 30, has passed away unexpectedly, reportedly due to a heart issue. Renowned for his disciplined, monk-like lifestyle focused on clean eating and rigorous training, Wang's sudden demise has sent shockwaves through the fitness community. His eight consecutive national titles and inspiring dedication made him a prominent figure, leaving a significant void in the sport.

title: Davante Adams injury update: Hamstring clouds Rams WR’s TNF return

Bernie Sanders targets tech billionaires: Musk, Bezos named; Calls AI push ‘dangerous’
description: Senator Bernie Sanders has called for a halt to new AI data center construction, citing concerns over job displacement and societal impact. He accuses tech billionaires of driving AI expansion for personal gain, potentially leading to massive unemployment and social isolation. Sanders also highlighted the immense electricity demands of AI infrastructure, warning of taxpayer burdens.

title: Message for Trump? FM Sitharaman says 'tariffs weaponised trade'; clears India's negotiation stand
description: Finance minister Nirmala Sitharaman highlighted that global trade is increasingly being weaponized through tariffs and other measures. She warned India must negotiate carefully in this evolving landscape, where trade is no longer free and fair. Sitharaman emphasised that India's actions aim to protect domestic industries from unfair competition and predatory practices.

title: H-1B visa row: Social media vetting triggers 221(g) slips; how future processing is affected
description: US visa applicants, particularly H-1B and H-4 holders, are facing increased scrutiny with consular officers reportedly asking about social media privacy settings. This has led to more 221(g) slips, indicating a temporary visa denial requiring further information. Applicants have one year to provide requested documents to avoid reapplying.

title: Amazon layoffs: Biggest ever job cuts in Europe; these roles are impacted the most
description: Amazon is cutting 370 jobs, or 8.5%, at its European headquarters in Luxembourg, impacting software developers most due to AI advancements. This is company's biggest ever job cuts in the Europe, following global layoffs back in October and a negotiated social plan. Despite the reduction, Luxembourg remains a strategic European hub for Amazon, which continues to hire in key areas.

title: Silent Hill Townfall: release date, story, gameplay, platforms & key details
description: Silent Hill Townfall, a highly anticipated collaboration, may be closer than expected. A recent retail listing suggests a March 26, 2026 release, fueling speculation about a new Silent Hill Transmission.  While details remain scarce, the game promises deep psychological horror, aligning with the studio's past work and the franchise's resurgence.

title: Quote of the day by Sylvester Stallone: 'I believe any success in life…'
description: Hollywood icon Sylvester Stallone's journey from struggle to stardom, exemplified by his self-penned 'Rocky,' underscores a philosophy of 'blind, furious optimism.' This quote, widely attributed to him, champions fearless belief and relentless effort in pursuing goals, even amidst uncertainty.
